name: Far Beyond
description:
It's the 1930s. You find yourself half frozen in the icy plains of Antarctica. How did that happen?

Created by Theodor Floridan Purcaru, Hans Peter Framvig Kyhl, Natalija Martiuk, Jonas Kappel Lund, Sebastian Raaberg Baasch, Austeja Vaicyte, Denisa Formackova, Mark Nielsen, Edward Giurgiu
